Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.15.0-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.15.0-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package azcopy is earlier than 10.15.0-13, affected by CVE-2023-44487
